channel.title: Model decompressor help

item.title: Model decompressor help
item.dc:creator: @jeffrey10027 jeffrey10027
item.description:
@jeffrey10027 wrote:

I need some help because Iâ€™m adding a 704 cache to a 562 client and when i go to run it wont take all the models from the cache. Could someone help me out with the model decompressor? I wanted it to take all of the item models from the 704 cache but keep it like a 562 client. (i dont like the cache being in the source and not in the client) Here is the one im trying to use:

[code=java] public static void loadHQModels() {
try {
DataInputStream indexFile = new DataInputStream(new FileInputStream(signlink.findcachedir()+"/HQ/null_cache.idx"));
DataInputStream dataFile = new DataInputStream(new FileInputStream(signlink.findcachedir()+"/HQ/null_cache.dat2"));

		int length = indexFile.readInt();
		for(int i = 0; i < length; i++) {
			int id = indexFile.readInt();
			int invlength = indexFile.readInt();
			byte[] data = new byte[invlength];
			dataFile.readFully(data);
			Model.method460(data, id);
		}
		indexFile.close();
		dataFile.close();
	} catch (Exception e) {
		e.printStackTrace();
	}
}[/code]

Read full topic
